metadata.name: TerraRealm Genesis Plot #1
metadata.description: TerraRealm is the ultimate metaverse where residentz invest in and own the ecosystem. At the intersection of gaming and DeFi, TerraRealm is the apex of community-based crypto. Enjoy unlimited opportunities for creativity and community-building, while earning $WETH and $TerraCoin! You can use your plotz however you want to build whatever you choose - kingdom or republic, destruction or creation, war or peaceâ€”the choice will be entirely up to you.
